verses.verse: I commend <WG4921> unto you <WG5213> Phoebe <WG5402> our <WG2257> sister <WG79>, who is <WG5607> a servant <WG1249> of the church <WG1577> that is <WG3588> at <WG1722> Cenchreae <WG2747>:

that <WG2443> ye receive <WG4327> her <WG846> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>, worthily <WG516> of the saints <WG40>, and <WG2532> that <WG2443> ye assist <WG3936> her <WG846> in1722, 3739 whatsoever <WG302> matter <WG4229> she may have need <WG5535> of you <WG5216>: for <WG1063> she <WG846> herself <WG3778> also hath been <WG1096> a helper <WG4368> of many <WG4183>, and2532, 2532 of mine <WG846> own self <WG1700>.
Salute <WG782> Prisca <WG4252> and <WG2532> Aquila <WG207> my <WG3450> fellow-workers <WG4904> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>,

who3748, 5294 for <WG5228> my <WG3450> life <WG5590> laid down <WG5294> their own <WG1438> necks <WG5137>; unto whom <WG3739> not <WG3756> only <WG3441> I <WG1473> give thanks <WG2168>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> all <WG3956> the churches <WG1577> of the Gentiles <WG1484>:

and <WG2532> salute the church <WG1577> that is in <WG2596> their <WG846> house <WG3624>. Salute <WG782> Epaenetus <WG1866> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the firstfruits <WG536> of Asia <WG882> unto <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>.
Salute <WG782> Mary <WG3137>, who <WG3748> bestowed <WG2872> much <WG4183> labor <WG2872> on <WG1519> you <WG2248>.

Salute <WG782> Andronicus <WG408> and <WG2532> Junias <WG2458>, my <WG3450> kinsmen <WG4773>, and <WG2532> my <WG3450> fellow-prisoners <WG4869>, who <WG3748> are <WG1526> of note <WG1978> among <WG1722> the apostles <WG652>, who <WG3739> also <WG2532> have been <WG1096> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> before <WG4253> me <WG1700>.
Salute <WG782> Ampliatus <WG291> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>.
Salute <WG782> Urbanus <WG3773> our <WG2257> fellow-worker <WG4904> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>, and <WG2532> Stachys <WG4720> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27>.
Salute <WG782> Apelles <WG559> the approved <WG1384> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>. Salute <WG782> them that are <WG3588> of <WG1537> the household of Aristobulus <WG711>.
Salute <WG782> Herodion <WG2267> my <WG3450> kinsman <WG4773>. Salute <WG782> them <WG3488> of <WG1537> the <WG3488> household of Narcissus <WG3488>, that are <WG3588> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>.

Salute <WG782> Tryphaena <WG5170> and <WG2532> Tryphosa <WG5173>, who labor <WG2872> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>. Salute <WG782> Persis <WG4069> the beloved <WG27>, who <WG3748> labored <WG2872> much <WG4183> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>.
Salute <WG782> Rufus <WG4504> the chosen <WG1588> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> mother <WG3384> and <WG2532> mine <WG1700>.
Salute <WG782> Asyncritus <WG799>, Phlegon <WG5393>, Hermes <WG2060>, Patrobas <WG3969>, Hermas <WG2057>, and <WG2532> the brethren <WG80> that are with <WG4862> them <WG846>.

Salute <WG782> Philologus <WG5378> and <WG2532> Julia <WG2456>, Nereus <WG3517> and <WG2532> his <WG846> sister <WG79>, and <WG2532> Olympas <WG3652>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the saints <WG40> that are with <WG4862> them <WG846>.
Salute <WG782> one another <WG240> with <WG1722> a <WG5370> holy <WG40> kiss <WG5370>. All the churches <WG1577> of Christ <WG5547> salute <WG782> you <WG5209>.

Now <WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> you <WG5209>, brethren <WG80>, mark <WG4648> them that are causing <WG4160> the divisions <WG1370> and <WG2532> occasions of stumbling <WG4625>, contrary to <WG3844> the doctrine <WG1322> which <WG3739> ye <WG5210> learned <WG3129>: and <WG2532> turn away <WG1578> from <WG575> them <WG846>.

For <WG1063> they that are such <WG5108> serve <WG1398> not <WG3756> our <WG2257> Lord2962, 2424 Christ <WG5547>, but <WG235> their own <WG1438> belly <WG2836>; and <WG2532> by <WG1223> their smooth <WG5542> and <WG2532> fair speech <WG2129> they beguile <WG1818> the hearts <WG2588> of the innocent <WG172>.

For <WG1063> your <WG5216> obedience <WG5218> is come abroad <WG864> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> men <WG5463>. I rejoice therefore <WG3767> over <WG1909> you <WG5213>: <WG1909> but <WG1161> I would have <WG2309> you5209, 1511 wise <WG4680> unto <WG1519> that which is good <WG18>, and <WG1161> simple <WG185> unto that <WG1519> which is evil <WG2556>.

And <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> shall bruise <WG4937> Satan <WG4567> under <WG5259> your <WG5216> feet4228, 1722 shortly <WG5034>. The grace <WG5485> of <WG2962> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216>.

Timothy <WG5095> my <WG3450> fellow-worker <WG4904> saluteth <WG782> you <WG5209>; and <WG2532> Lucius <WG3066> and <WG2532> Jason <WG2394> and <WG2532> Sosipater <WG4989>, my <WG3450> kinsmen <WG4773>.
I <WG1473> Tertius <WG5060>, who write <WG1125> the epistle <WG1992>, salute <WG782> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>.

Gaius <WG1050> my <WG3450> host <WG3581>, and <WG2532> of the <WG1577> whole <WG3650> church <WG1577>, saluteth <WG782> you <WG5209>. Erastus <WG2037> the treasurer <WG3623> of the city <WG4172> saluteth <WG782> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> Quartus <WG2890> the brother <WG80>.

Now <WG1161> to him that is able <WG1410> to establish <WG4741> you <WG5209> according to <WG2596> my <WG3450> gospel <WG2098> and <WG2532> the preaching <WG2782> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, according to <WG2596> the revelation <WG602> of the mystery <WG3466> which hath been kept in silence <WG4601> through times <WG5550> eternal <WG166>,

but <WG1161> now <WG3568> is manifested <WG5319>, and <WG5037> by <WG1223> the scriptures <WG1124> of the prophets <WG4397>, according to <WG2596> the <WG2316> commandment <WG2003> of the <WG2316> eternal <WG166> God <WG2316>, is made known <WG1107> unto all <WG3956> the nations <WG1484> unto <WG1519> obedience <WG5218> of faith <WG4102>:
to the only <WG3441> wise <WG4680> God <WG2316>, through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, to whom be <WG3739> the glory <WG1223> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>. Amen <WG1577>.
